markdownRemark.html:
What You Need

  1. TI-84 CE Graphing Calculator
  2. USB Charging Cable
  3. TI Connect CE Software

Steps

  1. Download the free TI Connect CE Software onto your computer (Mac or PC).
  2. Open TI Connect CE web app
  3. Take the USB Charging Cable and plug the USB side in

frontmatter.title: How to Install Games on your TI-84 Plus CE?
